mapper.select: SELECT stock_num, count, total_price, stock.user_id, product_id, sector_id, stock.warehouse_id FROM stock JOIN user ON user.user_id = stock.user_id JOIN admin ON user.admin_id = admin.admin_id WHERE stock.user_id = user.user_id AND user.admin_id = #{admin_id}
